ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Expanded Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: Orange Raven
ModMetaData.description:
Rebalance some items from the Vanilla Expanded mod serie.
Patched mods: - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Tribal - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings - Vanilla Apparel Expanded - Vanilla Armour Expanded
